description: Try this simple pork leg roast recipe made with just three ingredients. The result is succulent, tender meat with the added bonus of pork crackling.
keywords: Roast pork,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork Leg Roast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Remove the string and open up the pork. Trim 2cm from the ends of the skin, then roll up again. Secure with kitchen string.

Rub with oil and season with salt, then arrange on a wire rack over a roasting pan. Bake for 20 minutes, then reduce heat to 180°C and bake for 40 minutes. Increase heat to 220°C again and bake for a further 15 minutes. You’ll know it’s done when the crackling has formed and a probe thermometer reads 74°C in the thickest part. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve and serve with apple sauce.
